title: Meyer Lemon Tom Collins from Hot and Hot Fish Club Recipe
full_text:
Meyer Lemon Tom Collins from Hot and Hot Fish Club Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gin
Juice of
1
Meyer lemon
1
teaspoon
sugar
Ice
Chilled
soda water
Directions
Combine gin, juice, and sugar in a highball glass. Stir well. Add ice and top off with soda, stir lightly if desired and serve.
Gin
